casebody.data:
PRIESTS FOR LIFE, et al., petitioners,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, et al. No. 14-1453. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 6, 2015.

Motion of Association of American Physicians & Surgeons, et al. for leave to file a brief amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted. The case is consolidated.
